name: Get State/Overcycle
Increment Cycle Time
Increment Andon Time
Increment State Timers
Get Operator Name/Warning Cycle/Curr Serial No
Get SerialNo/PartNo/Quality
Get Andons
Prepare Bar Graph Data
Get GPA
Reset Global Variables
Prepare Cycle Time Output
Prepare Header Display
Prepare Bucket State Display
Prepare Cycle Status Display
Prepare Overcycle Timer
Prepare Non-Value Added Timer
Set TAKT Time/Get Station Name
Extract GPA
Set break status
CSS
format:
<style>
    :root {
	--primary-bg-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85);
    --secondary-bg-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);
    --station-color: #8500c2;
    --border-radius: 10px;
	--default-margin: 10px;
    --font-size-large: 62px;
    --font-size-medium: 40px;
    --font-weight-bold: bold;
    /* Add more as needed */
	}
	
	body {
        background-image: url("https://i.ibb.co/XkQss2f/dashboard-background-dx.jpg");
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: cover;
        font-family: Arial, sans-serif !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle /* Default header on each panel (only 'Extra Information' tab uses these right now) */ {
        font-size: var(--font-size-large) !important;
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold) !important;
        text-align: center;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        padding-top: 40px;
    } 

    ui-card-panel /* Background of each panel on the dashboard */ {
        border: 6px solid var(--secondary-bg-color) !important;
        border-radius: 30px;
        background-color: var(--primary-bg-color) !important;
        padding: 0px !important;
        margin-right: var(--border-radius) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-template /* Background of each sub-panel on the dashboard */ {
        background-color: var(--secondary-bg-color) !important;
        border-radius: 20px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(128, 128, 128, 0) !important;
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
        transform: scale(1) !important;
    }

    /*################################# Chart styling #################################*/

    ._md.layout-align-center-center.visible /* Chart background (e.g. Working Time vs. Overcycle Time)  */ {
        background-color: var(--secondary-bg-color) !important;
        border-radius: var(--border-radius);
        border: 1px solid rgba(128, 128, 128, 0) !important;
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    }

    .label.nr-dashboard-gauge-title.nr-dashboard-gauge-titlel /* Title of gauge on 'Single Station (Old Design)' tab */ {
        font-size: 24px !important;
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold) !important;
    }

    .label.nr-dashboard-chart-title.nr-dashboard-chart-titlel /* Title of charts (e.g. Working Time vs. Overcycle Time) */ {
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
    }

    html {
        zoom: 48%;
    }

    .md-toolbar-tools /* Top bar containing "PINpoint | IoT Dashboard" */ {
        font-size: 40px !important;
        font-weight: 500;
        padding: 46px !important;
    }

    /*################################# Header & image styling for single station view #################################*/

    .header {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 205px calc(98% - 400px) 195px; /* Adjusts column widths */
        grid-template-rows: 100px;
        grid-gap: var(--default-margin); /* Space between grid items */
        text-align: center; /* Centers text in grid items */
        padding: 0px; /* Padding around the grid */
        margin-bottom: 0px;
    }

    .equal {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
        grid-template-rows: 60px;
    }
    
    .header > div {
        border: 0px solid #ccc; 
        padding: 0px; /* Padding within grid items */
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium); /* Font size in grid items */
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .headerImage {
        max-width: 70px;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .headerStation {
        color: var(--station-color);
        font-size: 70px !important;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        align-items: center;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .headerStation > div {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .text-container {
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: var(--default-margin);
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        margin-bottom: auto;
    }
    
    .container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-start;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
    .image-container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        margin-top: 30px;
        margin-bottom: 40px;
        height: 100%;
    }
    
    .image-container img {
        max-width: 200px;
        max-height: 100%;
    }

    .not-in-use {
        color: #707b90;
        font-size: 70px !important;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        height: 100%;
        margin-top: 30px;
        font-style: italic;
    }

    /*################################# Header & image styling for multistation view #################################*/

    .headerMulti {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 95px calc(96% - 180px) 90px; /* Adjusts column widths */
        grid-template-rows: 100px;
        grid-gap: var(--default-margin); /* Space between grid items */
        text-align: center; /* Centers text in grid items */
        padding: 0px; /* Padding around the grid */
        margin-bottom: 0px;
    }
        
    .equalMulti {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
        grid-template-rows: 60px;
    }

    .headerMulti > div {
        border: 0px solid #ccc; /* Border around grid items */
        padding: 0px; /* Padding within grid items */
        font-size: 30px; /* Font size in grid items */
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        align-items: center;
    }
        
    .headerImageMulti {
        max-width: 60px;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        align-items: center;
    }
        
    .headerStationMulti {
        color: var(--station-color);
        font-size: 60px !important;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: flex-end;
        align-items: center;
        height: 100%;
    }
        
    .headerStationMulti > div {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
    }
    
    .image-containerMulti {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        margin-top: 30px;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .image-containerMulti img {
        max-width: 150px;
        max-height: 100%;
    }
    
    .text-containerMulti {
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: var(--default-margin);
        font-size: 30px;
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        margin-bottom: auto;
    }
    
    .containerMulti {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: flex-start;
    }

    .red {
        color: red;
    }
    
    .darkorange {
        color: darkorange;
    }
    
    .darkerorange {
        color: #FF6600;
    }
    
    .green {
        color: green;
    }
    
    .bold-text {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        text-align: center;
    }
    
    .status-imageMulti {
        width: 200px;
        height: auto;
    }

    .not-in-use-multi {
        color: #707b90;
        font-size: 60px !important;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        height: 100%;
        margin-top: 30px;
        font-style: italic;
    }


    /*################################# Custom scroll bar design #################################*/

    /* This is for webkit browsers like Chrome and Safari */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        width: 12px;
    /* Width of the vertical scrollbar */
        height: 12px;
    /* Height of the horizontal scrollbar */
    }
    
    /* Handle */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background: #888;
    /* Color of the scroll thumb */
        border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    /* Rounded corners on the scroll thumb */
    }
    
    /* Handle on hover */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
        background: #555;
    /* Color of the scroll thumb on hover */
    }

    /*################################# Custom dashboard menu & title bar styles #################################*/

    .md-sidenav-left._md { /* Side menu styles */
        background-color: rgba(218, 220, 211, 1);
        width: 400px !important;
        max-width: 500px !important;
    }

    .md-button { /* Buttons on the side menu */
        font-size: 36px !important;
    }

    .md-button.md-icon-button { /* Menu button */
        height: 90px !important;
        width: 90px !important;
    }

    ng-md-icon { /* Menu button icon */
        height: 58px !important;
        width: 74px !important;
        display: flex !important;
    }

    svg { 
        height: 54px !important;
        width: 50px !important;
    }

    .md-sidenav-left, md-sidenav { /* Controls height of the side menu */
        top: 92px !important;
    }
    
    
    /* The class below is from selecting a tab on the left side bar */

    /* button.md-no-style.md-button.md-ink-ripple[aria-label="Station 1"] {
        background: url('https://i.ibb.co/C548Yg0/8010A.png') no-repeat center center;
        background-size: 65%;
        font-family: 'none';
    }

    button.md-no-style.md-button.md-ink-ripple[aria-label="Station 2"] {
        background: url('https://i.ibb.co/3kn2S0d/8010B.png') no-repeat center center;
        background-size: 65%;
        font-family: 'none';
    }

    button.md-no-style.md-button.md-ink-ripple[aria-label="Station 3"] {
        background: url('https://i.ibb.co/V3HbNJv/8011.png') no-repeat center center;
        background-size: 65%;
        font-family: 'none';
    }

    button.md-no-style.md-button.md-ink-ripple[aria-label="Station 4"] {
        background: url('https://i.ibb.co/QXwt6b8/8012.png') no-repeat center center;
        background-size: 65%;
        font-family: 'none';
    } */


    /*################################# Plant Manager View #################################*/
    .plant-manager-header {
        text-align: center;
    }

    .main-header {
        text-align: center; 
        background-color: var(--secondary-bg-color) !important; 
        font-size: 90px;
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
    }

    .sub-header {
        text-align: center;
        background-color: var(--secondary-bg-color) !important;
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
    }

    .nr-dashboard-dropdown {
        background-color: var(--secondary-bg-color) !important;
    }

    .md-text {
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium) !important;
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold) !important;
        text-align: center !important;
    }

    .md-ripple-container {
        background-color: var(--secondary-bg-color) !important;
    }

    /*################################# Cycle Time Animations #################################*/

    @keyframes warning {
        0% { background-color: rgba(255, 165, 0, 1); }
        50% { background-color: transparent; }
        100% { background-color: rgba(255, 165, 0, 1); }
    }

    @keyframes overcycle {
        0% { background-color: rgba(255, 105, 97, 1); }
        50% { background-color: transparent; }
        100% { background-color: rgba(255, 105, 97, 1); }
    }

    .paused {
        background-color: rgba(152, 251, 152, 1); /* pastel green */
        width: 100%;
        border-radius: 30px;
    }

    .warning, .overcycle {
        width: 100%; /* make the div containing the animation full width */
        border-radius: 30px; /* set the border radius */
        animation: 2s infinite;
    }

    .warning {
        animation-name: warning;
    }

    .overcycle {
        animation-name: overcycle;
    }

    .normal {
        background-color: transparent;
    }

    /*################################# GPA Widget Styles #################################*/

    .gpa-div {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        height: 100vh;
    }

    .gpa-table {
        margin: auto;
        text-align: center;
        width: 100%;
        border-collapse: collapse;
    }

    .gpa-table-cells {
        width: 25%;
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium);
    }
    
    /*################################# Cycle Time Styles #################################*/

    .cycle-time-div-outer {
        text-align: center;
    }

    .cycle-time-hr {
        border: none;
        border-top: 1px solid #959c99;
        width: 95%;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
    }

    .cycle-time-div-inner {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        width: 100%;
    }

    .cycle-time-div-content {
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        font-size: 100px;
        color: black;
    }

    /*################################# Single Station NVA/OC Timers #################################*/

	/* same as text-container but with 0px margin top */
    .extra-timer-div-inner {
        text-align: center;
        margin-top: 0px;
        font-size: var(--font-size-medium);
        font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
        margin-bottom: auto;
    }
	
	.extra-timer-span-label {
		font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
	}
	
	.extra-timer-div-content {
		margin-top: 0px;
	}
	
	/* Span class is not needed since it uses same styles as cycle time timers! */

    /*################################# Andon Table Styles #################################*/
	
	.andon-table {
		text-align: left;
		width: 100%;
		border-collapse: separate;
		border-spacing: 0 var(--default-margin);
	}
	
	.andon-table-station-cell {
		border-top-left-radius: var(--border-radius);
		border-bottom-left-radius: var(--border-radius);
		width: 25%;
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
	}
		
	.andon-table-andon-cell {
		width: 25%;
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
	}
		
	.andon-table-description-cell {
		width: 30%;
		padding-left: 0px;
		text-align: left;
		white-space: normal;
	}
		
	.andon-table-duration-cell {
		border-top-right-radius: var(--border-radius);
		border-bottom-right-radius: var(--border-radius);
		width: 20%;
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
		text-align: right;
	}
	
	.andon-table-div-outer {
		text-align: center;
	}
	
	.andon-table-header {
		text-align: center;
		padding-bottom: 5px !important;
		margin-bottom: 0 !important;
		font-size: var(--font-size-medium);
	}
	
	.andon-table-div-content {
		text-align: left;
		font-size: 30px;
		font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
		margin-top: 0 !important;
	}

    /*################################# Station Widget Styles #################################*/

    .bucket-state-hr {
        border: none;
        border-top: 1px solid #959c99;
        width: 90%;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
    }
    
</style>

name: PINpoint Logo
format:
<script id="logoScript1" type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        // Check if the logo has already been added
        var existingLogo = $('#customLogo');
        if (existingLogo.length) {
            return; // Logo already added, no need to add it again
        }

        // Create a new div for the logo and give it an ID
        var div1 = $('<div id="customLogo"/>').css({'margin-left': 'auto', 'margin-right': '0'});
        var logo = new Image();
        
        // Set the logo source and other attributes
        logo.src = 'data:image/png;base64,'; // <-- Paste your base64 image string here
        logo.height = 90;

        // Append logo to the div
        div1.append(logo);

        // Function to add the logo to the toolbar when available
        var addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(function() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            if (toolbar.length && !$('#customLogo').length) {
                // The logo will be added to the right side of the title bar
                toolbar.append(div1);
                clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
            }
        }, 100);
    });
</script>
